short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: R'auncher provides shortcuts to R'web, Schedule, R'mail, iLearn/Blackboard!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The icons direct you to the following websites:

"Home" icon --> R'Web
"Calendar" Icon --> Term Schedule
"E-mail" Icon --> R'mail
"Bb" Icon --> UCR iLearn/Blackboard

Please consider leaving a review! Thanks a lot!
